ValidationRule.description: Makes sure 401(k) leads are not converted before Plan Type is known
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL( Status , "Qualified" ) && ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c , "401(k)" ) && ISPICKVAL( Plan_Type__c , "" ) && Owner:User.LastName <> "Claxton,Parks" && ISPICKVAL( Lead_Type__c, "Employer")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: 401(k) leads cannot be converted without the Plan Type being known.
